Ideal Utilities

Align Content

Use these classes to alter flexbox content alignment.

u-ac--flex-start

u-ac--flex-end

u-ac--center

u-ac--stretch

u-ac--space-between

u-ac--space-around

<p class="u-ac--flex-start"></p>
<p class="u-ac--flex-end"></p>
<p class="u-ac--center"></p>
<p class="u-ac--stretch"></p>
<p class="u-ac--space-between"></p>
<p class="u-ac--space-around"></p>

Align Items

Use these classes to alter flexbox item alignment.

u-ai--flex-start

u-ai--flex-end

u-ai--center

u-ai--baseline

u-ai--stretch

<p class="u-ai--flex-start"></p>
<p class="u-ai--flex-end"></p>
<p class="u-ai--center"></p>
<p class="u-ai--baseline"></p>
<p class="u-ai--stretch"></p>

Align Self

Use these classes to alter flexbox self alignment.

u-as--flex-start

u-as--flex-end

u-as--center

u-as--stretch

u-as--auto

<p class="u-as--flex-start"></p>
<p class="u-as--flex-end"></p>
<p class="u-as--center"></p>
<p class="u-as--stretch"></p>
<p class="u-as--auto"></p>

Background Color

Use these classes on any element to apply a background color.

u-bgc--white

u-bgc--white-off

u-bgc--gray-light

u-bgc--gray

u-bgc--gray-dark

u-bgc--theme-primary

u-bgc--theme-secondary

u-bgc--theme-tertiary

<p class="u-bgc--white"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--white-off"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--gray-light"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--gray"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--gray-dark"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--theme-primary"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--theme-secondary"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--theme-tertiary"></p>

Border

Use these classes on any element to apply a border.

u-border--all

u-border--x

u-border--y

u-border--top

u-border--right

u-border--left

u-border--none

<p class="u-border--all"></p>

<p class="u-border--y"></p>

<p class="u-border--right"></p>

<p class="u-border--left"></p>
<p class="u-border--none"></p>

Float

Use these classes to float an element to the left or right.

u-float--left

u-float--right

u-float--none

<p class="u-float--left"></p>
<p class="u-float--right"></p>
<p class="u-float--none"></p>

u-fs--italic

u-fs--normal

u-fs--oblique

<p class="u-fs--italic"></p>
<p class="u-fs--normal"></p>
<p class="u-fs--oblique"></p>

Use these classes on any element to change the font-weight.

u-fw--bold

u-fw--black

<p class="u-fw--light"></p>

<p class="u-fw--medium"></p>
<p class="u-fw--semibold"></p>
<p class="u-fw--bold"></p>
<p class="u-fw--black"></p>

Use these classes to hide an element.

u-hidden

<p class="u-hidden"></p>

Letter Spacing

Use these classes on any element to alter the letter-spacing.

u-ls--default

u-ls--compact

u-ls--normal

u-ls--loose

<p class="u-ls--default"></p>
<p class="u-ls--compact"></p>
<p class="u-ls--normal"></p>
<p class="u-ls--loose"></p>

List

Utility classes to control the appearance of a list element (e.g. ul, ol, dl).

  • .u-list--unstyled
  • .u-list--unstyled
<ul class="u-list--unstyled">
  <li></li>
</ul>
  • .u-list--inline
  • .u-list--inline
  • .u-list--inline
<ul class="u-list--inline">
  <li></li>
</ul>

Margin

Utility classes to control the margin on any side of an element.

Visual not available

Classname format: .u-abreviation--value

Example: .u-ma-0

Abbreviations: [ma, mx, my, mt, mr, mb, ml]
Values: [auto, 0, 5, 10, 20, 30, 40]

Overflow

Use these classes on any element to change the overflow property.

u-overflow--visible

u-overflow--hidden

u-overflow--scroll

u-overflow--auto

u-overflow--initial

<p class="u-overflow--visible"></p>
<p class="u-overflow--hidden"></p>
<p class="u-overflow--scroll"></p>
<p class="u-overflow--auto"></p>
<p class="u-overflow--initial"></p>

Padding

Utility classes to control the padding on any side of an element.

Visual not available

Classname format: .u-abreviation--value

Example: .u-pa-0

Abbreviations: [pa, px, py, pt, pr, pb, pl]
Values: [0, 5, 10, 20, 30, 40]

Text Align

Use these classes on an element to alter text alignment.

u-ta--left

u-ta--right

u-ta--center

<p class="u-ta--left"></p>
<p class="u-ta--right"></p>
<p class="u-ta--center"></p>

Text Decoration

Use these classes on an element to change the font-style.

u-text--strikeout

u-text--underline

<p class="u-text--strikeout"></p>
<p class="u-text--underline"></p>

Text Transform

Use these classes on an element to change the text-transform.

u-text--capitalize

u-text--lowercase

u-text--uppercase

<p class="u-text--capitalize"></p>
<p class="u-text--lowercase"></p>
<p class="u-text--uppercase"></p>

Truncate

Use this class to show an ellipsis instead of wrapped text.

u-truncate

<p class="u-truncate"></p>

Vertical Align

Use these classes to alter the vertical alignment.

u-va--baseline

u-va--bottom

u-va--middle

u-va--sub

u-va--super

u-va--text-bottom

u-va--text-top

u-va--top

<p class="u-va--baseline"></p>
<p class="u-va--bottom"></p>
<p class="u-va--middle"></p>
<p class="u-va--sub"></p>
<p class="u-va--super"></p>
<p class="u-va--text-bottom"></p>
<p class="u-va--text-top"></p>
<p class="u-va--top"></p>

White Space

Use this class to prevent text wrapping.

u-text--nowrap

<p class="u-text--nowrap"></p>

Media Queries

Uses custom properties to make media queries more semantic.

## Custom Properties available
@custom-media --mq-xs (min-width: 20em);
@custom-media --mq-sm (min-width: 30em);
@custom-media --mq-md (min-width: 35.5em);
@custom-media --mq-lg (min-width: 48em);
@custom-media --mq-xl (min-width: 64em);
@custom-media --mq-xxl (min-width: 80em);

## Usage
@media (--mq-xs) {}
@media (--mq-sm) {}
@media (--mq-md) {}
@media (--mq-lg) {}
@media (--mq-xl) {}
@media (--mq-xxl) {}

## Each loop
@each $mq in var(--mq-options) {

  @if $(mq) == e {
    .u-name {}
  } @else {
    @media (--mq-$(mq)) {
      .u-name\@$mq {}
    }
  }

}
